roles.title: As a Frontend Developer
responsibilities: Designed and developed websites emphasizing intuitive UI/UX for diverse clients.
Developed and maintained university and government websites, ensuring seamless compatibility and performance across devices.

roles.title: As a Backend Developer
responsibilities: Engineered server-side logic and databases, specializing in RESTful API development.
Ensured robust scalability, security, and performance for web applications.

roles.title: As a Fullstack Developer
responsibilities: Develops and maintains full-stack web applications, integrating frontend and backend components.
Collaborates with teams to define features, conduct code reviews, and ensure high application quality standards.

description: Participated as volunteer in Huawei Cloud Project for one mouth duration.
